definitions.definition: A large vessel for drinking (usually alcoholic beverages ).
The contents , or quantity of the contents, of such a vessel.
An unlikely word that a cryptic crossword solver constructs from the wordplay and crossing letters only to discover that it actually exists in the dictionary.

main_definition: A large vessel for drinking (usually alcoholic beverages ).
secondary_definitions: The contents , or quantity of the contents, of such a vessel.

( Can we verify this sense?) ( crosswording ) An unlikely word that a cryptic crossword solver constructs from the wordplay and crossing letters only to discover that it actually exists in the dictionary.
